item.description:
This meditation group meets weekly on Sundays 5-6:15 p.m. (donation only) and is good for beginners as well as experienced meditators.  Please arrive a little early so we can start right at 5:00.  Doors will open by 4:45. 
    Being guided will help you relax and let go. It's a nice community of people in a lovely setting in a healing space. Kriya meditation is based on the teachings of Yogananda.  It is a guided meditation meant to bring about a felt sense of divine love into your body, heart and mind.  After the guided portion we spend time in silence. Then questions or sharing. This practice is non-denominational, appropriate for anyone.  See all programs at A Higher Balance at www.AHigherBalance.com .  All are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at The Hawthorne Building, the large glass doors to the left of H&R Block.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group
